word_mean: 黑猩猩：学名Pan troglodytes，一种类人猿，栖息于非洲热带雨林，因其对人类某些疾病的易感性而可用于实验研究，又因其具高水平智力而用于行为研究

entry.def: A chimpanzee is a kind of small African ape.

means.word_mean: 1. intelligent somewhat arboreal ape of equatorial African forests
